title.rendered: Biometrics in healthcare: use cases, benefits, and things to consider

<title>Biometrics in Healthcare: Applications, Advantages, Challenges — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Biometrics in healthcare can solve patient matching and identification issues. Other advantages of health biometrics identification systems include reducing costs and improving patient experience. Learn about biometrics applications in healthcare and the challenges you might face when deploying medical biometrics." />
